dictionary.step_four_description: Add custom text to your design.
dictionary.alert_box_stepper: In order to complete this step, you have to select product to customize on first step.
dictionary.alert_box_file_type:
Dear customer!

This file is not an image!.
Please select any image type file to customize and to continue customize your cover.
dictionary.alert_box_image_size:
Dear customer!

This image file is too small!.

Please select larger image size and customize your cover.
dictionary.alert_box_out_of_stock:
Dear customer!

This type of case for selected phone model is currently out of stock and currently unavailable but will be in stock in 10 days.

You can continue to customize it and it will be sent to your address as soon as it is available.
dictionary.alert_box_cart_full:
Dear customer!

Orders placed before 3 pm on working days are dispatched the same day. Orders placed between 3 pm on Friday and 1 pm on Sunday will be dispatched on Sunday.
dictionary.alert_box_cart_finish:
Dear customer!

 Your custom case for your device is successfully created.

 Continue to CHECKOUT button to complete your order.

dictionary.alert_box_stepper: Da biste nastavili sa prilagođavanjem, morate zavrišiti prvi korak i izabrati model telefona.
dictionary.alert_box_file_type:
Ovaj tip dokumenta nije slika.

Odaberite sliku da nastavite dalje.
dictionary.alert_box_image_size:
Dragi korisniče!

Ovaj format slike je previše malih dimenzija.

Molim vas, da odaberete sliku većih dimenzija.
dictionary.alert_box_out_of_stock:
Dragi korisniče!

Ovaj artikal trenutno nije na stanju.

Možete da nastavite sa prilagođavanjem ali će navedeni artikal biti dostupan u roku od 10 dana.
dictionary.alert_box_cart_full:
Dragi korisniče!

Narudžbe napravljene pre 3 u ponoć radnim danima dostavljaju se isti dan . Narudžbe pre 3 posle ponoći petkok  i u 1 nakon ponoći  nedeljom biće dostavljene u naredni ponedeljak.
dictionary.alert_box_cart_finish:
Dragi korisniče!

Uspešno ste dizajnirali maskicu za vaš telefon.

Nastavite proces kupovne pritiskom na dugme KUPOVINA.
